name: Algebraic Mapping to TQFT CS Level (Discrete)
description: Construction of discrete non-linear mapping to CS level k satisfying Witten conditions.

hypothesis.H0: No discrete mapping k(T) achieves > 80% Witten consistency or mapping remains tautological (r >= 0.95 with V).
hypothesis.H1: Discrete quantization algorithm based on Jones roots achieves > 80% Witten consistency and r < 0.95.

data_requirements.description: Topology constants and Jones polynomial roots from SSOT/external database.

test_method: Discrete functional mapping evaluation with permutation significance testing.
